contractBalance().notice: returns contract OHM holdings, including bonuses provided

forfeit().notice: forfeit sOHM in warmup and retrieve OHM

giveLockBonus(uint256).notice: provide bonus to locked staking contract

index().notice: returns the sOHM index, which tracks rebase growth

returnLockBonus(uint256).notice: reclaim bonus from locked staking contract

setContract(uint8,address).notice: sets the contract address for LP staking

setWarmup(uint256).notice: set warmup period in epoch's numbers for new stakers

toggleDepositLock().notice: prevent new deposits to address (protection from malicious activity)
